alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Coastal Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Watch issued January 14 at 12:19PM EST until January 16 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate coastal flooding possible. * WHERE...Coastal Jefferson, Coastal Wakulla and Coastal Taylor Counties. * WHEN...From Saturday evening through Sunday evening. Peak water levels are expected around the time of high tide early Sunday morning between 1 AM and 2 AM. * IMPACTS...Water levels will increase Saturday evening. Numerous roads along the coast could flood and become impassible. Structures near the coast not elevated could flood.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Coastal Wakulla
